name: profil3r-tools
description: Comprehensive build and test suite for Profil3r tools

scripts.install-all: npm run install-osint && npm run install-js-tools
scripts.install-js-tools: cd js_tools/facebook_mass_messenger && npm install && cd ../messenger_bot_framework/fbbot && npm install
scripts.build: npm run build-osint && npm run build-js-tools
scripts.build-js-tools: cd js_tools/facebook_mass_messenger && npm install && cd ../messenger_bot_framework/fbbot && npm install
scripts.start-services: concurrently "npm run start-osint" "npm run start-messenger" "npm run start-mass-messenger"
scripts.test: npm run test-unit && npm run test-e2e
scripts.test-e2e-cross-browser: npm run test-e2e-chrome && npm run test-e2e-firefox && npm run test-e2e-edge
scripts.test-e2e-parallel: cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/health-checks/*.cy.js' --record --parallel & cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/osint/*.cy.js' --record --parallel & cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/messenger/*.cy.js' --record --parallel & cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/integration/*.cy.js' --record --parallel & wait
scripts.validate-php: command -v php >/dev/null 2>&1 && find php_tools -name '*.php' -exec php -l {} \; || echo 'PHP not found, skipping PHP validation'
scripts.validate-python: command -v python3 >/dev/null 2>&1 && find telegram-facebook-bot -name '*.py' -exec python3 -m py_compile {} \; || echo 'Python3 not found, skipping Python validation'
scripts.validate-all: npm run validate-php && npm run validate-python && npm run lint
scripts.serve-test-env: concurrently "npm run start-services" "sleep 10 && npm run test-e2e"
